html:
ProGrade has a few instant rebates on their highly-regarded CFexpress Type B memory cards. There is a small selection of CFexpress Type B 4.0 cards as well as a few multi-packs for further savings.

ProGrade CFexpress Type B Deals

  • ProGrade Digital 512GB CFexpress 4.0 Type B Gold Memory Card (2-Pack) $269 (Reg $359)
  • ProGrade Digital 512GB CFexpress 4.0 Type B Gold Memory Card $139 (Reg $199)
  • ProGrade Digital 2TB CFexpress 2.0 Type B Gold Memory Card (2-Pack) $999 (Reg $1299)
  • ProGrade Digital 256GB CFexpress 2.0 Type B Gold Memory Card (2-Pack) $244 (Reg $305)
  • ProGrade Digital 256GB CFexpress 2.0 Type B Gold Memory Card $127 (Reg $169)

Prograde Gold CFexpress 4.0

Designed for emerging mainstream imaging applications, the 256GB CFexpress 2.0 Type B Gold Memory Card from ProGrade Digital provides read speeds of up to 1700 MB/s, which helps to quickly offload content to your computer, and write speeds of up to 1400 MB/s.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
